title: E-Commerce Dashboard
description: A comprehensive dashboard for managing online stores, featuring real-time analytics, inventory management, and order tracking. Built with React and Django Rest Framework.

title: AI Task Manager
description: Smart task management application that uses AI to prioritize daily activities. Features drag-and-drop interface and natural language processing.

title: Social Media Analytics
description: Analytics tool for social media influencers to track engagement and growth. Includes detailed charts and automated PDF reports.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website to showcase projects and skills. Features a Bento grid layout, dark mode, and dynamic content fetching.

title: basic project first
description: A scalable, cloud-native e-commerce solution designed for high-volume transactions with real-time inventory synchronization.
longDescription: Architected a microservices-based e-commerce platform capable of handling 50k+ concurrent users. Implemented a distributed caching layer with Redis to reduce database load by 40%. Integrated Stripe for secure payments and built a custom analytics dashboard for vendor performance tracking. The system features automated deployment pipelines via CI/CD and is fully containerized with Docker.

title: AI Analytics Dashboard
description: An interactive data visualization tool powered by machine learning algorithms to predict market trends.
longDescription: Developed a sophisticated dashboard for financial analysts to visualize complex datasets. utilized Python and TensorFlow for backend predictive modeling, processing over 1TB of historical data. The frontend, built with React and D3.js, renders fluid, real-time charts with sub-second latency. Features include role-based access control, exportable PDF reports, and WebSocket integration for live market updates.

title: SaaS Task Manager
description: ollaborative productivity suite featuring kanban boards, real-time chat, and automated workflow triggers.
longDescription: Engineered a real-time collaboration tool for remote teams, focusing on seamless state synchronization. Leveraged WebSockets for instant updates across all connected clients. Built a robust RESTful API with Django Rest Framework, ensuring secure data handling with JWT authentication. The application includes a drag-and-drop interface, file sharing capabilities, and integration with third-party tools like Slack and GitHub.
